text: Satan's Brew () is a 1976 German black comedy movie directed by Rainer Werner Fassbinder and starring Kurt Raab, Margit Carstensen, Helen Vita, Volker Spengler, Ingrid Caven, Marquard Bohm, Brigitte Mira. ==Other websites== * Category:1976 comedy movies Category:1970s black comedy movies Category:German comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Rainer Werner Fassbinder
title: Satan's Brew
